name: Villa Terraces
description:
Introducing the luxurious Village Terraces, a stunning condominium nestled in the enchanting Southern Zone of Costa Rica. This exquisite two-story house offers an unparalleled living experience, combining elegance, comfort, and breathtaking ocean views.
With three spacious rooms, this property is perfect for accommodating up to six people in absolute style and comfort. Each room is meticulously designed to provide a serene and tranquil ambiance, ensuring a restful night's sleep. The master bedroom boasts panoramic views of the glistening ocean, allowing you to wake up to the soothing sounds of the waves.
Step outside onto the expansive terrace and immerse yourself in the beauty of Costa Rica's natural surroundings. The private pool offers a refreshing oasis where you can relax and soak up the sun, all while enjoying the mesmerizing ocean vistas that stretch as far as the eye can see.
The property includes two designated parking spots, ensuring convenience and security for your vehicles. Village Terraces is a gated community with round-the-clock security, guaranteeing your peace of mind and privacy. Additionally, the presence of a dedicated concierge service enhances your living experience by catering to your needs and ensuring a seamless stay.
With 3.5 bathrooms, including an en-suite in the master bedroom, convenience is prioritized. The laundry room provides the convenience of in-house laundry facilities, adding to the overall comfort and ease of your stay. Pets welcome. 4x4 required.
